thread.title: The Pixies will play Stage AE in October
thread.title_full: The Pixies will play Stage AE in October

author: Scott Mervis / Pittsburgh Post-Gazette
title: The Pixies will play Stage AE in October
text:
The Pixies will play Stage AE in October February 21, 2017 10:12 AM The Pixies By Scott Mervis   
Post-punk legends The Pixies will play Stage AE for the first time on Oct. 4 on the second leg of the band’s North American tour. 
Tickets go on sale Friday at ticketmaster.com. Go to www.pixiesmusic.com for pre-sales details. 
The touring band consists of Black Francis, Joey Santiago and David Lovering with bassist Paz Lenchantin still in for Kim Deal. The sets, drawing from 90 rehearsed songs, will revisit the classics as well as material from the 2016 album, “Head Carrier.” 
Scott Mervis: smervis@post-gazette.com; 412-263-2576.
